entries.title: Senior Front End Developer
details: Develop and maintain custom WordPress themes for clients utilizing PHP, JavaScript, SASS/CSS
Use REST APIs to develop SPAs with Vue.JS and React
Work closely with design team to maintain design and web development standards
Mentor, assist, and provide code reviews for junior web developers

entries.title: Front End Developer
details: Collaborated with back end developers to oversee design of web applications and create style guides for our team
Worked on front end development of applications utilizing HTML, Ruby, Sass, Bootstrap, React, and Git
Designed and contributed to development of in-house web applications for internal team use

entries.title: Web Designer & Developer
details: Created branding, marketing materials, landing pages, and digital & print advertisements
Designed, built, and customized client websites based on the clientâ€™s unique needs using WordPress, custom post types, and Advanced Custom Fields (ACF)
Implemented search engine optimization techniques on client websites

entries.title: Web Designer
details: Collaborated with design team, and managed design process from concept to code
Developed and maintained code for in-house and client projects using WordPress, HTML, CSS, PHP, and JavaScript / jQuery
Designed web and print materials for internal and external promotional events
Provided direction for team members and interns
